#include<stdio.h>
int no_of_digit(int a)
{
    int count = 0;
    while(a>0)
    {
        count += 1;
        a /= 10;
    }
    return count;
}
int find(int a,int b,int sum)
{
    int a_s = no_of_digit(a);
    int b_s = no_of_digit(b);
    if(a_s<b_s)
        a_s = b_s;
    int su_s = no_of_digit(sum);
    if(su_s>a_s)
        return 1;
    return 0;
}
int main()
{
    while(1)
    {
        int a,b;
        scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
        if(a==0 && b==0)
            return 0;
        int carry=0,ans=0,tm,tmp;
        int sum = a+b;
        while(a>0 || b>0)
        {
            tm = a%10;
            tmp = b%10;
            if((tm+tmp+carry)>=10)
            {
                ans += 1;
                carry = (tm+tmp+carry)/10;
            }
            a /= 10;
            b /= 10;
        }

        if(ans==0)
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
        else if(ans==1)
            printf("%d carry operation.\n",ans);
        else
            printf("%d carry operations.\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
